A managing account is the human-run account responsible for the automated account.
Connect your accounts from the Automation page in your settings.
Once the accounts are connected, the automated account will have a label.
Connect your managing and automated accounts

Automated accounts are programmed to perform certain actions automatically through the X API. Like posting a region’s weather conditions, for example. They’re created and managed by other people on X.
Yes, all automated accounts need to be labelled. This is required under our {{}}new rules{{}}.

"Labels let the world know who’s managing the automated account.
Once an automated account owner has connected their managing account, a label will appear on the automated account profile and posts."
Learn more on the {{}}automated account label FAQ{{}} page.
Do I need to label my automated accounts?
How do I label my automated account?

Connect a managing account so your automated account receives an automated account label. All automated accounts must be connected to a managing account. {{}}Learn more{{}}

TIP: Thanks for going live! Welcome people by saying “hi” to them when they join your video.
TIP: Thank you for going live on X! <3
TIP: Try mentioning people by name when they join your live video – they’ll be thrilled!
TIP: Be sure to go live for at least a few minutes to make it easier for people to find you.
TIP: Ask your viewers where they’re from – it’s a great way to break the ice.
TIP: Thank people for tuning in and respond to their comments to keep them watching.
TIP: If you lose your connection while going live, go somewhere with a better signal.
TIP: Ask people to follow you so they can get notified the next time you go live.
TIP: Start your live video by saying “hi” right away. People watching afterwards will love it.
TIP: Thank people for watching before you end your live video.
TIP: Enter a title before you go live to help people discover your video.
TIP: A descriptive title helps people better understand what your live video is about.
TIP: Need ideas? Give a tour, share a talent, or talk about something that interests you.
TIP: Make sure you have a strong phone signal before going live.
TIP: Add a hashtag to your title to help people discover your live video.
TIP: That’s all the tips we have for now — thanks for going live on X!

Unfollowing someone removes all their posts from your timeline.

We flagged more than 10 potentially abusive or spammy accounts.
When we detect potentially abusive or spammy replies, mentions or quotes, we temporarily autoblock those accounts. Unlike manual blocks, autoblocks only last for a week.
Autoblocked accounts, just like manually blocked accounts, can’t see your posts, follow you or message you. If they view your profile, we let them know that X autoblocked them, and not you.
Existing replies from autoblocked accounts are moved to the bottom of the conversation, so fewer people see them.
Here’s what happens when Safety Mode is on
